pageContext.title: In brief: Baidu pumps $87m in Chinese smart lock startup
pageContext.content:
China’s search engine giant Baidu has led a US$87 million financing round in YunDing Network Technology, a startup focused on smart locks. The investment is Baidu’s latest effort in pushing the growth of smart home devices in the country. Baidu said in a statement that it will power YunDing with its AI technologies and smart cloud service to “further complete its smart home ecosystem”.

Source: South China Morning Post

seo.title: In brief: Baidu invests $87m in smart lock startup YunDing
seo.description: Baidu will also provide YunDing access to its artificial intelligence technologies and smart cloud service.
